title: Ban.GG riot

Ty Riot for permaBan. :) 
When players trolling, afk, feeding intention its okay,  i have so many friends who doing it, never got Perma ban/14days.
But sure, i flamed people cause i got 3 ** trolls in a row i got perma banned... sure. i payed aboud 400â‚¬ for skins, and missions and more things.I was 14days banned, for AFK cause PC problems, but this is my fault i know.. but this.. IDK what to say.. only.. thanks.
I know i flamed.. but why PERMA FFS.. 14days is enough i think. but ur system saying something other..
BTW alot of this was with my friends and we trolled our selves.

replies.body: It does look like you were using the chat to belittle your own teammates quite a bit, so that could have been the main factor in the punishment. I'd suggest reaching out to the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you want the full context of why this type of behavior would have been actioned on.
